spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ram Sugar is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). Ram Sugar has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Ram Sugar has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ram Sugar makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Ram Sugar exhales fire in a 30-foot-long line that is 5 feet wide. Any creature in the line must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
